summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Fauntleroy Avenue from Wildwood Place to Brace Point Drive, and certain other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9488 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of " Payment in Bonds".
